tips.title: Use Potions Wisely
tips.description: Don't wait until you're almost dead to use a health potion. Use them when you're at 50% HP or lower to avoid defeat.

tips.title: Status Effects Matter
tips.description: Apply Poison or Bleeding to monsters for damage over time. These debuffs can turn the tide of difficult battles!

tips.title: Target Weaknesses
tips.description: Fire spells deal extra damage to ice creatures. Lightning hurts mechanical enemies. Learn monster weaknesses for easier victories!

tips.title: Match Your Level
tips.description: Fight monsters near your level for optimal XP and loot. Too easy = little reward. Too hard = likely defeat!

tips.title: Time of Day Matters
tips.description: Undead creatures are weaker during the day but stronger at night. Plan your adventures around the clock!

tips.title: Explore Thoroughly
tips.description: Visit all sub-locations within a biome to discover hidden merchants, rare monsters, and special events.

tips.title: Upgrade Regularly
tips.description: Replace your gear every 5-10 levels. Better equipment dramatically increases your combat effectiveness!

tips.title: Balance Your Stats
tips.description: Don't focus only on damage. Defense, HP, and utility stats keep you alive longer. A dead hero deals no damage!

tips.title: Enchant Your Best Gear
tips.description: Save your enchanting materials for rare or epic items. Enchanting low-quality gear is a waste of resources!

tips.title: Sell Excess Items
tips.description: Don't hoard low-quality loot. Sell common and uncommon items to merchants for gold. Keep rare+ items!

tips.title: Invest in Passives
tips.description: Spend Souls on passive bonuses early. Account-wide bonuses help all your characters, even after death!

tips.title: Complete Dailies
tips.description: Daily quests and seasonal challenges provide consistent gold and XP income. Complete them every day!

tips.title: Complete Achievements
tips.description: Achievements grant XP, gold, and sometimes unique items or titles. Aim for 100% completion!

tips.title: Join Raids
tips.description: Raid bosses drop the best loot in the game. Team up with other players for epic rewards!

tips.title: Dungeon Modifiers
tips.description: Enable hard mode, ironman, or speed run modifiers for increased difficulty and 1.5-3x rewards!

tips.title: Build Faction Reputation
tips.description: High reputation unlocks exclusive merchants, abilities, and mounts. Focus on one faction at a time!

tips.title: Form a Party
tips.description: Party up with friends for shared loot and coordinated combat. Tanks, healers, and DPS work together!

tips.title: Use Twitch Chat
tips.description: Viewers can vote on raid events! Engage your community for interactive gameplay and bonus rewards.

tips.title: Gather Materials
tips.description: Salvage unwanted items for crafting materials. Materials are used for crafting and enchanting!

tips.title: Discover Recipes
tips.description: Find recipe books and scrolls to unlock new crafting options. Rare recipes create powerful items!

tips.title: Level Crafting Skills
tips.description: Gain crafting XP by creating items. Higher crafting levels unlock better recipes and improve success rates!

tips.title: Save Often
tips.description: Your progress is automatically saved after major actions. Check your last save time in settings!

tips.title: Read Quest Text
tips.description: Quest descriptions contain hints about objectives and rewards. Pay attention to the story!

tips.title: Experiment with Classes
tips.description: Each class has unique strengths. Try different classes to find your favorite playstyle!

tips.title: Check the Map
tips.description: The world map shows danger levels and recommended levels. Plan your route before traveling!

tips.title: Join Events
tips.description: Seasonal events offer limited-time rewards and challenges. Don't miss out on exclusive content!
